body_html: You can do it as a custom op callable from Python. Here's an example -- https://github.com/yaroslavvb/max_align_bytes_op . It prints 16 on my mac. But how would you force your numpy arrays to be 16-byte aligned?
body_text: You can do it as a custom op callable from Python. Here's an example -- https://github.com/yaroslavvb/max_align_bytes_op  . It prints 16 on my mac. But how would you force your numpy arrays to be 16-byte aligned?
body: You can do it as a custom op callable from Python. Here's an example -- https://github.com/yaroslavvb/max_align_bytes_op  . It prints 16 on my mac. But how would you force your numpy arrays to be 16-byte aligned?
